tossup_question: 6) MATH  Edward graphs the equation y = 3x + 1. If he wants to draw a line perpendicular to it, what should his slope be?
bonus_question: 6) MATH  Edward has a collection of marbles! In his bag, he has 2 red marbles, 1 green marble, and 3 blue marbles. If Edward does not put the marble back in the bag after he has chosen it, what is the probability that he picks a red marble twice?
